title: 820-00165 clean me region
message:
Hi Team,
I have a mba that loads the os very slowly and then get stuck at 100%, it had water damage around the U6101 and U6100 area.
the mba has already been touch by some else apparently: a trace was rebuilt and the U6100 bios chip replaced: i took it out and read it with the TL866 and the serial numbers in the chip and on the back cover are NOT the same.
Do you know where i can get a clean efi bin file for an 820-00165, like in that topic at the 2nd page:
[url]https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/11949-macbook-air-2015-board-820-00165-problem-with-loading-osx-after-efi-reprogramed/page2[/url]

Speedyaction is the owner of the file, i've alerady tried to contact him by PM and through the forum topic but so far i had no reply from him.

I would like to rebuilt a good bios file with the correct serial number, i've read that for the 820-00165 it's not like the previous models regarding the ME region like it's explained in the ghostlyhaks tutorial, in fact in the820-00165 bios files i have i can't find any "KRID" .
So maybe if you could also explain how to generate a clean ME region.

Thanks
